summary: This is an FBI FD-302 form documenting a proffer interview with a former employee of Jeffrey Epstein, identified as YEI-RD. The witness details her employment from approximately 2005-2006, describing her role in scheduling massage appointments, her own sexual assault by Epstein, the network of individuals involved, and the operational details of Epstein's abuse scheme in New York, Palm Beach, and the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the investigation. The witness's employer who sexually assaulted her and directed her to schedule sexual massages with other girls.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Epstein's associate who directed the witness's work, lived in a house where the witness worked, and was involved in the operation.

persons.name: Paolo Zempoli
persons.context: A modeling agent with 'ID Models' who was trying to buy Elite Models with Epstein and introduced the witness to Epstein.

persons.name: Melania Trump
persons.context: Mentioned as having been introduced to Donald Trump by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Mentioned as having been introduced to Melania Trump by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Leslie Groff
persons.context: Epstein's assistant in his New York office who scheduled appointments, including massage appointments.

persons.name: Martin Novack
persons.context: Met with Epstein during trips to Harvard in Boston.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Met with Epstein during trips to Harvard and is noted as having received a massage from a woman named 'Cha'.

persons.name: Jean Luc Brunel
persons.context: Modeling agent who traveled regularly with Epstein. The witness was told to send him photographs of girls for casting/scouting.

persons.name: Igor
persons.context: Epstein's personal trainer who traveled with him.

persons.name: Sarah
persons.context: Described as Epstein's girlfriend who had an intimate relationship with him, traveled with him, and assisted with tasks. She was a model associated with Karin Models/MC2.

persons.name: Kellen
persons.context: Epstein's personal assistant whom the witness helped. The witness's immediate supervisor after Maxwell.

persons.name: Nadia
persons.context: Brought other girls, including two 16-year-old dancers, to Epstein. Also brought girls and had a baby.

persons.name: Cha
persons.context: A woman with a tattoo who gave massages to Epstein and Alan Dershowitz. Described as providing more 'professional' massages.

persons.name: Larry Summers
persons.context: Mentioned as having a lengthy meeting with Epstein in a waiting room.

persons.name: David Copperfield
persons.context: Noted as having been at Epstein's house one time.

persons.name: Janusz Banasiak
persons.context: Helped gather items (computers, phone books) to be turned over to a person believed to be law enforcement.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Epstein's counsel who told the witness not to talk to law enforcement.

persons.name: YEI-RD
persons.context: The interviewee, a former assistant to Jeffrey Epstein from ~2005-2006. She describes being sexually assaulted by Epstein and her role in scheduling massage appointments for him.

persons.name: AUSA Ma
persons.context: Present at the proffer interview of the witness.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Present at the proffer interview of the witness (name redacted).

persons.name: Special Agent Ma
persons.context: Present at the proffer interview of the witness.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: Present at the proffer interview of the witness (name redacted).

connections.description: Epstein employed the witness as an assistant from approximately 2005 to early 2006.
Epstein sexually assaulted the witness during a 'massage' at his New York home early in their acquaintance.
Maxwell was a supervisor who gave direction to the witness and provided her with an apartment.
Maxwell was deeply involved in Epstein's operations, directing staff and being involved in the massage appointment scheme.
Described as Epstein's girlfriend; they exchanged 'I love you' and had an intimate relationship.
Brunel traveled regularly with Epstein, and Epstein sent him photographs of girls for his modeling agency.
Met with Epstein during trips to Harvard. Dershowitz received a massage from a woman named 'Cha'.
Were trying to buy Elite Models together. Zempoli introduced the witness to Epstein.
Kellen was the witness's immediate supervisor; the witness helped her with errands and tasks.
Nadia brought girls, including underage dancers, to Epstein for massages.
Indyke was Epstein's counsel who instructed the witness not to speak to law enforcement.

events.title: Witness Meets Epstein
events.description: The witness (YEI-RD) is introduced to Jeffrey Epstein through modeling agent Paolo Zempoli. Epstein later offers her a job and an apartment.

events.title: Sexual Assault of Witness
events.description: During her first one-on-one interaction at Epstein's New York home on 71st Street, Epstein takes her to a massage room, uses a 'vibrating thing' on her against her will.

events.title: Witness's Employment and Scheduling Role
events.description: The witness works for Epstein, with key duties including answering phones, confirming massage appointments in Palm Beach and New York, and researching girls. She describes the routine of twice-daily sexual massages.

events.title: Evidence Removal Instructions
events.description: Following a theft, Epstein and Kellen instruct the witness to gather computers and personal contact phonebooks from various properties and turn them over to a person believed to be law enforcement. She is also told to shred an updated list of girls' names.

events.title: Epstein's Counsel Instructs Silence
events.description: Epstein's attorney, Darren Indyke, calls the witness into his office and tells her not to talk to law enforcement.

events.title: Witness Resigns
events.description: The witness resigns from Epstein's employment because she felt something 'weird' was going on and did not want to be around him anymore.

events.title: Car Returned
events.description: The witness and her husband return a car Epstein had given her to Palm Beach.

events.title: Proffer Interview
events.description: The witness (YEI-RD) is interviewed by the FBI and prosecutors in West Palm Beach, Florida, pursuant to a proffer agreement.

keyFacts: The witness, a former assistant, was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein during a 'massage' at his New York home early in their acquaintance.
The witness's primary job duties involved scheduling and confirming twice-daily massage appointments for Epstein in New York and Palm Beach, which she understood to be sexual in nature.
The witness names several individuals who brought girls to Epstein, including Nadia, who brought two 16-year-old dancers, and Sarah (Epstein's girlfriend).

Epstein's operation involved systematic evidence control; the witness was instructed to gather and turn over computers/phonebooks to a third party and to shred lists of girls' names during an investigation.
Epstein's attorney, Darren Indyke, explicitly told the witness not to talk to law enforcement.
